thread.title: Simply amazing hotel, staff and location!
thread.title_full: Simply amazing hotel, staff and location! - Review of Hotel De Buci by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 162stephaniejade
title: Simply amazing hotel, staff and location!
text: Words cannot express what a wonderful experience I had at this hotel. First and foremost, Sanjay and his staff are truly exceptional. They are caring, warm and go out of their way to make sure their guests are happy. For a first-time visitor in Paris, I truly felt that I was surrounded by friends. The hotel itself is BEAUTIFUL! I enjoyed many quiet moments in my room, looking out onto Rue de Buci. The location could not have been more perfect. I was able to walk nearly everywhere I wanted to go and the hotel is surrounded by tons of cafes and boutique shops. I could not have had a more wonderful stay in Paris and will not stay anywhere else if I return. On my birthday, I was given a bottle of champagne (courtesy of the hotel) and a box of macrons. They truly made me feel very special. THANK YOU SANJAY AND THE REST OF THE STAFF! YOU ARE EXCEPTIONAL!
